frameDefinitions: An Executive_authority exchanges one penalty, the Original_punishment, for another less severe one, the New_punishment.
The action of an Agent or the occurrence of a Cause event returns an Entity to an earlier  state of vigor and strength.
An Assessor examines a Phenomenon to figure out its Value according to some Feature of the Phenomenon.

A Communicator processes some information (either from textual or real-world/perceptual sources) regarding a State_of_affairs into a concise form (a summary) that contains the essential content in briefer form, and communicates this summary to an Addressee, or records it in a Medium.
A Cognizer carries out an approximate calculation or considers some Evidence so as to arrive at an approximate Value for some Feature of an Item.
A Cognizer computes a Result on the basis of input Numbers by addition.   '
frameExamples: On December 15, 1971, Governor Winfield Dunn conditionally <t>commuted</t> his sentence to twenty years.
Falling prices and wireless connectivity have <t>breathed new life</t> into the PDA market.
Each company is then <t>evaluated</t> for their earning potential. CNI
Frank has already <t>summarized</t> some of the reactions on his weblog.
Until 1971, dolphin mortality could be <t>estimated</t> only from analyses of vessels ' logbooks -- and the figures are probably underestimates. CNI
listRoleDefinitions: The constitutionally specified authority who has the power to commute punishments.
The punishment the <fen>Offender</fen> was originally sentenced to.
The time at which the <fen>Original_punishment</fen>  is commuted.
The location where the <fen>Executive_authority</fen> commutes the <fen>Original_punishment</fen>.
The concrete or abstract thing that is brought into an earlier state in which it was more effective and powerful.
The <fen>Agent</fen> puts the <fen>Entity</fen> into a state of renewed vigor.
An event or state whose occurrence brings about the <fen>Entity</fen>'s return to a vigorous state.
This role identifies the time when the <fen>Agent</fen> causes the renewal of the <fen>Entity</fen>.
This role identifies the place where the Agent brings about the change in the <fen>Entity</fen>'s state.
The sentient entity that evaluates the <fen>Phenomenon</fen>.
The entity whose <fen>Value</fen> according to a <fen>Feature</fen> is being measured.
The type of property or feature that the <fen>Phenomenon</fen> is being judged on.
An event or procedure that allows the <fen>Assessor</fen> to evaluate the <fen>Phenomenon</fen>.
<fen>Medium</fen> is the physical entity or channel used by the <fen>Assessor</fen> to make the assessment.
The time at which the <fen>Assessor</fen> makes the assessment.
The location where the assessing takes place.
The <fen>Communicator</fen> creates and communicates the summary of the Information.
The <fen>State_of_affairs</fen> is summarized by the <fen>Communicator</fen>.
The textual or other <fen>Medium</fen> through which the <fen>Communicator</fen> summarizes.
The time at which the <fen>Communicator</fen> makes the <fen>Summary</fen>.
The location where the <fen>Communicator</fen> communicates.
The individual who considers evidence or performs calculations to arrive at an approximation.
The feature is a scalar property of the <fen>Item</fen>.
The position or area  on the <fen>Feature</fen> scale that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> concludes the <fen>Item</fen> occupies.
The entity that possesses the <fen>Feature</fen> whose <fen>Value</fen> the <fen>Cognizer</fen> seeks to approximate.
A proposition expressing the <fen>Cognizer</fen>'s approximation of a <fen>Feature</fen>'s <fen>Value</fen>.
An open proposition for which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> seeks to approximate the <fen>Value</fen> of a variable.
The time period during which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> forms the estimate of the <fen>Feature</fen>'s <fen>Value</fen>.
The location in which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> forms their estimate.
The person doing the calculation.
The <fen>Numbers</fen> that are used in the calculation.
The outcome of the <fen>Cognizer</fen>'s calculcations.
The time at which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> operates on the <fen>Numbers</fen>.
The location where the <fen>Cognizer</fen> performs their calculation
listRoleExamples: Hearst was sentenced to seven years in prison. 1979, <fex>President Jimmy Carter</fex> commuted Hearst's prison sentence after she served nearly two years.
I had learned after all of this period of time has passed the court was about to let (Bush) pay a sum of money and commute <fex>her sentence</fex> to time served.
Israel <fex>yesterday</fex> commuted the lengthy prison terms of seven Jews convicted of murdering or plotting to kill Arabs.
The reinvigoration <fex>of the tourism</fex> economy is recognised by many as an ambitious but necessary objective.
<fex>We</fex> revitalized the Golden Mountaineer Card, and we gave seniors a prescription drug benefit.
Rock has been rejuvenated creatively and commercially <fex>by hip-hop-inspired rock acts</fex>.
Production was revitalized <fex>last June</fex>.

New York's distinction as America's tax cut leader has revitalized the economy
<fex>in every corner of the state</fex>.
You will also be graded <fex>on your speed of response</fex> .
<fex>The study</fex> evaluated the risk of a major quake.
<fex>This chapter</fex> evaluates the far-left's contribution to the environmentalism debate since the '70's .
The committee rated Smithers ' most loyal servant ' <fex>about a week ago</fex> .
They 'll evaluate you <fex>in that room over there</fex> , and then you 're free to go .
<fex>The government</fex> estimated the cost of meeting EC water standards at £3-4 billion.

In one march from 42 Street down to Washington Square Park, the crowds were
estimated <fex>in size</fex> from 125000 (NYPD estimate) to over 200000 (march organizers).
Sotheby 's have estimated its value <fex>at $10m-$14m</fex>.
I estimated <fex>the house</fex> at about 60-65% full.
At the time they estimated <fex>there to be as many as four million to the acre</fex>.
Then Sandia estimated <fex>how many people would die and be injured within the first year due to their radiation exposure</fex>.
The US Forest Service estimated <fex>last year</fex> that 45 million piñons have died so far in north-central New Mexico.
<fex>At the London School of Economics</fex> they estimated that China would have to spend 2% of gross. domestic product on higher. education for 15 years
